specialists.title: Experienced professionals
specialists.description: Experienced professionals will provide you with seemingly complex information in a fairly simplified form.

check.title: Small groups, individual approach
check.description: The courses are held in groups of 6-8 students, ensuring an individual approach to each student.

coffee.title: Comfortable furnished classrooms
coffee.description: Learning process will become even more pleasant in our comfortably furnished classrooms.

timeMoney.title: Possibility of free participation in 3 classes
timeMoney.description: All students will be given 3  free lessons, which will give you the opportunity to try your hand and get acquainted with the course.

chatVideo.title: Class recording
chatVideo.description: At the end of each lesson, you will also receive a video of the lesson to repeat at home.

support.title: Online assistant
support.description: Throughout the course, you will receive remote support from a specialist.

time.title: Credit training
time.description: A very good opportunity to study on credit terms and pay for the tuition at the end of the course after getting a job.

rocket.title: Career growth
rocket.description: All students will get 1 month free training from our HR specialist to create a successful career.

workOffer.title: Job offer
workOffer.description: At the end of the course, students who have shown the best results will be offered jobs in partner organizations.
